column1: The Industrial Revolution was the transition to new manufacturing processes in the period from about 1760 to sometime between 1820 and 1840. This transition included going from hand production methods to machines

The Industrial Revolution began in Great Britain and most of the important technological innovations were British.The Industrial Revolution marks a major turning point in history; almost every aspect of daily life was influenced in some way.
